As a second step of the data extraction one should process the obtained data to:
1. obtain a format like markup language that can be used as input for text-based models ([Parsing with NOUAGAT](./parsing.ipynb))
2. remove irrelevant information from the raw data to make the system more robust and cheaper ([Data cleaning](./cleaning.ipynb))
